name: tinyGAME
description:
tinyGAME is my take on a microgame title, similar to titles like Warioware or Four Second Frenzy.

I made this prototype as my Final Year Project when studying Tech Game Dev at Teesside Uni. I may update it in future if the want takes me.

The vast majority of the art was done by my vary good friend Sophie Boon, who can be found at https://sophieboon.com/
